header.append: Set up passkey for easier login

passkey-append.body_point1: Quick and secure login using face, fingerprint or PIN instead of passwords.
passkey-append.body_point2: Passkeys are stored on the device or in the cloud, accessible from connected devices.
passkey-append.body_subtext: Biometric data will never leave your device.

passkey-error.body: Adding a passkey to your account was not possible. Please try again or use another method.

passkey-appended.body: You can now confirm your identity using your passkey when you log in.

email-otp.body_description: Enter the passcode sent to your email address

email-link-sent.header: Check your inbox to create your account
email-link-sent.body_description: We just sent a magic link to your email address

subheader.isOldTab: Return to the tab where you have verified the email
subheader.isNewTab: Return to the tab where you are performing the signup to continue

email-link-error.subheader: Return to the tab where you are performing the signup and try again

phone-otp.body_description: Enter the passcode sent to your phone number

passkey-background.body_description: We are connecting to your authenticator.

passkey-error.body_description: Login with passkeys was not possible. Try again or use other method.

email-otp.body_description: Enter the passcode sent to your email address

postLoginVerification.header: Your email is not verified yet
postLoginVerification.body_description: Please verify your email by entering the one-time passcode we just sent to your email.

email-link-sent.header: Check your inbox to log in
email-link-sent.body_description: We just sent a magic link to your email address

postLoginVerification.header: Your email is not verified yet
postLoginVerification.body_description: Please verify your email by clicking on the email magic link we just sent to you.

subheader.isOldTab: Return to the tab where you have verified the email
subheader.isNewTab: Return to the tab where you are performing the login to continue

email-link-error.subheader: Return to the tab where you are performing the login and try again

phone-otp.body_description: We just sent a verification code to your phone number

postLoginVerification.header: Your phone number is not verified yet
postLoginVerification.body_description: Please verify your phone number by entering the one-time passcode we just sent to you.

confirm_process_abort.subheader: Are you sure you want to abort the signup process? Any information you've entered will be lost.
confirm_process_abort.confirm: Yes, take me back to the start

identifier_already_in_use.username: This username is already taken. Please try another one or log in with this one.
identifier_already_in_use.email: This email address is already taken. Please try another one or log in with this one.
identifier_already_in_use.phone: This phone number is already taken. Please try another one or log in with this one.

identifier_invalid_format.username: Username must be between 4 and 32 characters long and may only consist of alphanumeric characters and "-" or "_".
identifier_invalid_format.email: Please enter a valid email address.
identifier_invalid_format.phone: Please enter a valid phone number.

errors.invalid_conditional_ui_login: The provided passkey is no longer valid. Please enter your identifier (e.g. email) manually.
errors.no_fallback_available: This app requires passkey authentication. Please use a compatible device.
errors.userAlreadyExists: Email address is already in use. If this account is yours, please log in instead.
errors.passkeyAlreadyExists: Passkey for this device already exists
errors.invalidPasskey: The provided passkey is no longer valid. Log in using your email address instead.
errors.invalid_challenge_solution_email-otp: The code is invalid or expired
errors.invalid_challenge_solution_phone-otp: The provided one-time passcode is not valid
errors.noConditionalUiSupport: Conditional UI is not supported by your device
errors.conditionalUiUnconfirmedCredential: This passkey can not be used yet. Please confirm your identity first by logging in with your email address.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again later

unexpectedError.withCustomerSupport: We encountered an issue. Please try again later or contact support at {{customerSupportEmail}}.
unexpectedError.noCustomerSupport: We encountered an issue. Please try again later or contact support.

componentUnavailable.subheader: Our service is currently not available.
componentUnavailable.body_withCustomerSupport: Please refresh the page and if the problem persists, contact support at {{customerSupportEmail}}.
componentUnavailable.body_noCustomerSupport: Please refresh the page and if the problem persists, contact support.

passkey-list.title: PASSKEYS
passkey-list.warning_notLoggedIn: Please log in to see your passkeys.
passkey-list.message_noPasskeys: You don't have any passkeys yet.

dialog_delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?

dialog_passkeyAlreadyExists.body: A passkey for this device already exists. If you are facing issues with your passkey, please delete it and create a new one.

dialog_passkeysNotSupported.body: Unfortunately, passkeys are not supported on your device.

user.name: Name
user.warning_notLoggedIn: Please log in to see your current user information.
